attributes.additional_details:
Alan Bates has worked doggedly for free on behalf of hundreds of innocent victims - against the juggernaught that is The Post Office. A real David & Goliath story if ever there was.

If the CBE gets lost in the post going back, then perhaps consider giving Mr Alan Bates a much deserved knighthood.

He is one person who has earned it.
attributes.background: What a delicious irony it would be to give Alan Bates the now spare CBE - instead of putting it back into the cupboard. Or perhaps a Kighthood!

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
